title: A1398 820-00426 full fan spin
message:
Hi,

I have an A1398 820-00426 with full fan spin and laggy. The web cam is damaged and so I disconnected it.

After replacing the trackpad, with the cable, the Mac had a normal behavior for about one day, and then, by it self, it gets again with full fan spin and laggy.

It has no knocked down components and no liquid contact signs.

Can you help?

title: A1398 820-00426 full fan spin
message: You should try known good trackpad board and especially flex.
